How COVID impacted local government 🦠🏛️

Jun 2, 2021

  • civictech
  • episode
  • public policy
  • state government
  • local government
  • COVID-19

Mark Funkhouser, former Mayor of Kansas City and owner of Funkhouser and Associates joins us for a conversation the impact COVID-19 has had on state and local government. We’ll also dive into a conversation about Federal policy response and what those relief funds mean for governments.
